Text.val: 04.06.2012 SH SCR17370 Extended length of v.RECOGNITIONSTRING to alpha 40
-- Write rows from file to database
... multiple '0' header rows possible (new statement begins)
... row which starts with '1' contains the old balance and account number
... remaining rows of one statement (if rows do not start with 2-9 they can be
... extract last statement date (can be null)
